title: 4J Studios：今天欧洲发布了Minecraft PS4光盘版
author: kaho
txt_content:
4J Studios：The retail disc version of #MinecraftPS4 is available today in Europe!
4J Studios：光盘版的 Minecraft PS4 现在可以在欧洲地区购买了！

replies.author: village
replies.txt_content: 光盘版？什么东西= =

replies.author: 52Dora
replies.txt_content: 欧洲...肯定会有人问为什么不是天朝

replies.author: leavessoft
replies.txt_content: Microsoft的logo呢？？

replies.author: kaho
replies.txt_content:
leavessoft 发表于 2014-10-3 18:31
Microsoft的logo呢？？
Minecraft 所有的主机版均由（貌似）4J开发，与微软、Mojang无关
